Class MinioService

java.lang.Object

    • createPublicBucket

      private void createPublicBucket(String bucketName) throws io.minio.errors.MinioException, IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException
      Create a public bucket in Minio.
      Parameters:
      bucketName - : The name of the bucket.
      Throws:
      io.minio.errors.MinioException - if an error occurs.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if an algorithm is not available.
      InvalidKeyException - if the key is invalid.

    • bucketExists

      private boolean bucketExists(String bucketName) throws io.minio.errors.MinioException, IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException
      Check if a bucket exists.
      Parameters:
      bucketName - : The name of the bucket.
      Returns:
      True if the bucket exists, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      io.minio.errors.MinioException - if an error occurs.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if an algorithm is not available.
      InvalidKeyException - if the key is invalid.

    • createBucketIfNotExists

      private void createBucketIfNotExists(String bucketName, boolean isPublic) throws io.minio.errors.MinioException, IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException

      Parameters:
      bucketName - : The name of the bucket.
      isPublic - : True if the bucket should be public, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      io.minio.errors.MinioException - if an error occurs.

      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if an algorithm is not available.
      InvalidKeyException - if the key is invalid.

    • uploadFile

      public void uploadFile(String bucketName, String objectName, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile multipartFile, boolean isPublicFile) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, io.minio.errors.MinioException
      Upload a file to Minio.
      Parameters:
      bucketName - : The name of the bucket.
      objectName - : The name of the object.
      multipartFile - : The file to upload.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the algorithm SHA-256 is not available.
      InvalidKeyException - If the key is invalid.
      io.minio.errors.MinioException

      Check if a document exists and belongs to a company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - Company id.
      objectName - Object name.
      Returns:

      Throws:
